ingredients: 3 cups mangos, peeled, seeded and chopped, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon orange juice, 3 tablespoons water
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 4%, Saturated Fat 2g 10%, Cholesterol 8mg 3%, Sodium 24mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 36mg 178%, Calcium 17mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 203mg 4%
